title: Skin has been locked after purchase
body: Blade mistress Morgana skin has been locked. After it being gifted to me from a friend. What do I need to do for it to get unlocked!!! I am not paying for it again!!!!!!!

replies.body:
Since this is an account-specific issue that we'll need to investigate, I recommend you reach out to our account specialists by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Let me know if you have any questions.
I did, now when will I get my skin back!!
